      • Signal

        public Signal()

      • Signal

        public Signal(int id,
              java.lang.Boolean clear,
              java.lang.String direction,
              int upNeigh,
              int downNeigh)
        Parameters:
        id - int ID for this Signal
        clear - true by default. true = CLEAR, false = STOP
        direction - String representation of a Direction
        upNeigh - int ID of the up neighbour Block
        downNeigh - in ID of the down neighbour Block
